Page.name: Default gutter size
Page.description: Sets a default spacing between items

PageTemplate.name: Default gutter size
PageTemplate.description: Sets a default spacing between items

Widget.name: Align self
Widget.description: Float the element to the left or to the right.

DivContainer.name: Align content
DivContainer.description: Align content of this element left, right or center it. Align elements inside the container as a row or as a column.

DivContainer.name: Background color
DivContainer.description: Change the background color of the container.

DivContainer.name: Border sides
DivContainer.description: Show a border on specific sides only

DivContainer.name: Border radius
DivContainer.description: Set a border radius for rounded borders

DivContainer.name: Shade
DivContainer.description: Apply a shade to your background color

DivContainer.name: Shadow
DivContainer.description: Add a shadow to this element

DivContainer.name: Display
DivContainer.description:
Sets the display type of the container. Choose from:

- Block: Stacks child elements vertically.
- Inline Block: Displays the container as an inline-level block.
- Flex: Aligns and distributes child elements within a flexible container.

DivContainer.name: Flex gap
DivContainer.description: Sets a gap between the items in the container

Button.name: Weight
Button.description: Emphasize the text with a heavier or lighter font weight

Button.name: Align icon
Button.description: Place the icon to the right or on top of the button.

Button.name: Full width
Button.description: Extend the button to the full width of the container it is placed in.

Button.name: Border
Button.description: Style the button with a transparent background, a colored border, and colored text.

ListView.name: Style
ListView.description: Change the appearance of rows in the list view.

ListView.name: Hover style
ListView.description: Highlight a row when hovering over it. Only useful when the row is clickable.

ListView.name: Row size
ListView.description: Change the row spacing of the list view.

LayoutGrid.name: Cards style
LayoutGrid.description: Makes the columns appear as cards.

LayoutGrid.name: Background color
LayoutGrid.description: Change the background color of the columns.

LayoutGrid.name: Column gap
LayoutGrid.description: Sets a gap between the layout grid columns.

LayoutGrid.name: Row gap
LayoutGrid.description: Sets a gap between the layout grid rows.

LayoutGrid.name: Align
LayoutGrid.description: Align content of the whole layout grid vertically.

DataGrid.name: Style
DataGrid.description: Choose one of the following styles to change the appearance of the data grid.

DataGrid.name: Hover style
DataGrid.description: Enable data grid hover to make the rows hoverable.

DataGrid.name: Row size
DataGrid.description: Increase or decrease the row spacing of the data grid row.

TemplateGrid.name: Style
TemplateGrid.description: Choose one of the following styles to change the appearance of the template grid.

TemplateGrid.name: Hover style
TemplateGrid.description: Enable template grid hover to make the rows hoverable.

GroupBox.name: Style
GroupBox.description: Choose one of the following styles to change the appearance of the groupbox.

GroupBox.name: Callout style
GroupBox.description: Enable the groupbox callout functionality to highlight the importance of the groupbox.

StaticImageViewer.name: Style
StaticImageViewer.description: Choose the style of your image.

StaticImageViewer.name: Center
StaticImageViewer.description: Align the image in the center of an element.

DynamicImageViewer.name: Style
DynamicImageViewer.description: Choose the style of your image.

DynamicImageViewer.name: Center
DynamicImageViewer.description: Align the image in the center of an element.

Label.name: Style
Label.description: Change the appearance of a label.

TabContainer.name: Style
TabContainer.description: Change the appearance of the tab container

TabContainer.name: Tab position
TabContainer.description: Change the position of the tabs

DynamicText.name: Size
DynamicText.description: Make the text smaller or larger.

DynamicText.name: Weight
DynamicText.description: Emphasize the text with a heavier or lighter font weight

DynamicText.name: Letter case
DynamicText.description: Change the letter case of the text.

DynamicText.name: Wrap options
DynamicText.description: Break long words and sentences into multiple lines.

Table.name: Style
Table.description: Change the appearance of cells in the table.

Table.name: Compact
Table.description: Change the spacing between cells to be compact.

com.mendix.widget.web.accordion.Accordio.name: Compact
com.mendix.widget.web.accordion.Accordio.description: Make groups in the accordion more compact.

com.mendix.widget.web.image.Image.name: Align content
com.mendix.widget.web.image.Image.description: Align content of this element left, right or center it. Align elements inside the container as a row or as a column.

com.mendix.widget.web.image.Image.name: Image fit
com.mendix.widget.web.image.Image.description: Change the fit of the image.

com.mendix.widget.web.image.Image.name: Opacity
com.mendix.widget.web.image.Image.description: Change the opacity of the image.
